name: webrtc-adapter
description: A shim to insulate apps from WebRTC spec changes and browser prefix differences

scripts.preversion: git stash && git checkout master && git pull && npm test | faucet && git checkout -B bumpVersion
scripts.postversion: git push --force --set-upstream origin bumpVersion --follow-tags && export GITTAG="echo $(git describe --abbrev=0 --tags | sed 's/^v//')" && git checkout gh-pages && git pull && cp out/adapter_es5.js adapter.js && cp adapter.js adapter-`$GITTAG`.js && rm adapter-latest.js && ln -s adapter-`$GITTAG`.js adapter-latest.js && mkdir adapter-`$GITTAG`-variants && cp out/adapter.js adapter-`$GITTAG`-variants/ && cp out/adapter_*_.js adapter-`$GITTAG`-variants/ && git add adapter.js adapter-latest.js adapter-`$GITTAG`.js adapter-`$GITTAG`-variants && git commit -m `$GITTAG` && git push --set-upstream origin gh-pages && git checkout master
